name: text
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ai_generated_content_detector.
Tool description: This AI generated content checker API tries to detect whether provided text is generated by some AI bot or it is human-written.
API description: Converts the input text into a fancy text format using the Ajith Fancy Text API.

text.description: The text to be converted into fancy text.
text.default: I don't possess personal experiences, emotions, or consciousness. Instead, I generate responses based on patterns and information present in the data I was trained on. My purpose is to assist users like you to the best of my abilities and provide helpful information and responses to your inquiries. If you have any questions or need assistance with a topic, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to provide you with the information you're looking for.
